Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Easier to ask AI for feedback compared to a tutor and you can ask for feedback more often.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I get stressed out when I need to ask for help from a tutor in person or online, I'm able to recieve feedback at my own pace when using AI.
